title: One for the road
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Dennis A. Hill
brief_description: A few hours in the life of Bill Smith show why you should not mix drinking with driving. The affect of alcohol is illustrated with a model brain: although not drunk Smith’s brain power was sufficiently impaired to cause a fatal accident.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Dennis A. Hill
